net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.common

Class AbstractSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.common.AbstractSize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadLengthProperty, AttributeReadMaximumSize, AttributeReadMinimumSize, AttributeReadSize, AttributeReadSizeInPixel, AttributeWriteLengthProperty, AttributeWriteMaximumSize, AttributeWriteMinimumSize, AttributeWriteSize, AttributeWriteSizeAdvanced, Size
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractUiWidgetNative.SizeImpl, UiWidgetAdapterGwtTree.TreeNodeAdapter.SizeImpl

    public abstract class AbstractSize
extends Object
implements Size
    This is the abstract base implementation of the Size interface.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
